content: cat toy rollies a simple knits design i created this cat rollie pattern almost 15 years ago to make cat toys for a fundraising bazaar for a friend who had cancer i hope you enjoy making them as much as i have i still make and donate these to my local animal shelter materials hook size h 5 mm about 4 yds worsted weight yarn large eyed sewing needle cotton balls size about 1 25 high gauge not important key chain - chain half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet st s - stitch es instructions note i save my 8 to 1 yard worsted weight yarn row 1 ch4 =double_crochet + ch1 work 9 double_crochet in chain farthest scraps to make these toys i tie 2 or more colors from hook join with a slip st to the top of the ch4 together until i have enough yarn to make a rollie 10 double_crochet kitties like the 2 color ones because as they roll the colors seem to move which attracts their eyes ball will curl around your thumb as you work the and attention next two row have fun row 2 ch2 =half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in each st around 10 half_double_crochet join to top of ch2 with a slip st row 3 repeat row 2 pull yarn through last stitch cut yarn leaving at least a 6 tail for sewing insert cotton ball thread yarn in a large eyed sewing needle sew under the front loops along the top of the last row © 1998 vicki mikulak all rights reserved pull tight to gather and close the top stitch to for personal non-commercial use only secure the end weave in yarn tail cut off excess questions simple knits@yahoo com revised 2/8/2013
